column4: trying to get sound working in ubuntu how should troubleshoot
what is the problem with your sound?
any particular file type or no sound out all including system sounds?
yes no system sounds or file sounds e.g. mp3 and what not...I have all the codecs installed properly
DidgitalNinja: i just upgraded to edgy
what do you think the next logical step should be
in your sound settings, is sounds set to autodetect
or have you specified what sound card to use
in sytem -> preferences -> sound click on devices tab and see what the settings are
daviey: i upgraded to edgy only today
and it's been seamless so far
